You should aim to be successful. But not too successful. Otherwise you will threaten the man". Because I am female. I am expected to aspire to marriage. I am expected to make my life choices. Always keeping in mind that. Marriage is the most important. Now marriage can be a source of. Joy and love and mutual support. But why do we teach to aspire to marriage. And we don't teach boys the same?. We raise girls to each other as competitors. Not for jobs or for accomplishments. Which I think can be a good thing. But for the attention of men.
